description:
As likeable as Handa is, his negative outlook leads to mixed results in his encounters with various students.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: Handa et la suite de l`épisode 1 / Handa et le président / Handa et le mannequin
Handa-kun and the Continuation of Episode 1 / Handa-kun and the Chairperson / Handa-kun and the Model
Handa-kun to Ichiwa no Tsuzuki / Handa-kun to Iinchou / Handa-kun to Model
半田くんと一話のつづき / 半田くんと委員長 / 半田くんとモデル
